# Templates

Copy-paste code for common React patterns.

import { Cards, Card, Callout } from 'nextra/components'

<Callout type="info">All templates are production-ready with TypeScript, proper error handling, and accessibility built-in.</Callout>

## Categories

<Cards>
  <Card title="Hooks" href="/docs/templates/hooks" />
  <Card title="Utilities" href="/docs/templates/utils" />
  <Card title="Components" href="/docs/templates/components" />
</Cards>

## Hooks

Reusable React hooks for common functionality.

| Hook | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| [useDebounce](/docs/templates/hooks/use-debounce) | Delay value updates for search inputs |
| [useLocalStorage](/docs/templates/hooks/use-local-storage) | Persist state in localStorage |
| [useClickOutside](/docs/templates/hooks/use-click-outside) | Detect clicks outside elements |
| [useMediaQuery](/docs/templates/hooks/use-media-query) | Responsive design with JS |
| [useCopyToClipboard](/docs/templates/hooks/use-copy-to-clipboard) | Copy text with feedback |
| [useToggle](/docs/templates/hooks/use-toggle) | Boolean state management |

## Utilities

Helper functions for common operations.

| Utility | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| [cn](/docs/templates/utils/cn) | Merge Tailwind classes |
| [Date Formatting](/docs/templates/utils/format-date) | Format dates with date-fns |
| [Currency Formatting](/docs/templates/utils/format-currency) | Format money values |
| [String Helpers](/docs/templates/utils/string-helpers) | Slugify, truncate, capitalize |

## Components

Production-ready React components organized by category.

### Authentication

| Component | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| [Login Form](/docs/templates/components/auth/login-form) | Sign in with validation |
| [Signup Form](/docs/templates/components/auth/signup-form) | Registration with password rules |
| [Auth Provider](/docs/templates/components/auth/auth-provider) | Zustand auth state + JWT |

### Data Display

| Component | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| [Data Table](/docs/templates/components/data/data-table) | TanStack Table with sorting, filtering |
| [Infinite List](/docs/templates/components/data/infinite-list) | Infinite scroll with TanStack Query |
| [Search with Filters](/docs/templates/components/data/search-filters) | Debounced search + URL state |

### User Management

| Component | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| [User Profile](/docs/templates/components/user/user-profile) | Profile editing with avatar upload |

## Tech Stack

All templates use:

| Technology | Purpose |
|------------|---------|
| TypeScript | Type safety |
| Tailwind CSS | Styling |
| shadcn/ui | UI primitives |
| React Hook Form | Form handling |
| Zod | Validation |
| TanStack Query | Server state |

## Installation

Install the base dependencies for all templates:

```bash
# Core utilities
npm install clsx tailwind-merge date-fns

# Forms and validation
npm install react-hook-form zod @hookform/resolvers

# Server state
npm install @tanstack/react-query

# UI components
npx shadcn-ui@latest init
npx shadcn-ui@latest add button input label card checkbox alert
```
